content.rendered:
control monitoring intelligence optimisation

Solutions

Follow us

  • Facebook

  • Instagram

  • Twitter

  • LinkedIn

Play
Video

Expertise

Our solutions deliver a cycle of expertise.

We start with control system provision and upgrade. This is the hardware that we have a proud history building over the past 40-50 years. From there, we offer condition based monitoring to establish performance and asset integrity. Our monitoring solutions are then underpinned by analytics and intelligence insights derived from that process, which ultimately aids the optimisation of assets and critical infrastructure. Control, monitoring, intelligence and optimisation – four core specialisms to improve efficiencies, productivity and extend life.

Control

More

Monitoring

More

Optimisation

More

Intelligence

More

Advanced Technology

Solutions

Leveraging our expertise

With the right people in place and the right knowledge, our technical experts around the world have been responsible for some truly innovative technology solutions, from our Artemis 2G (A2G) subsea electronics module, to today’s ECG™ holistic cable monitoring system. No project is the same. Proserv’s rich history in controls means that we can leverage the expertise from one product family and apply it to another, sharing technology and best practices to create new and disruptive solutions, all while operating to the highest safety and quality standards.
